glsa.title: MPlayer: Heap-based buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: MPlayer contains multiple integer overflows that may lead to a heap-based buffer overflow.

background.p: MPlayer is a media player that supports many multimedia file types.

description.p: Xfocus Team discovered multiple integer overflows that may lead to a heap-based buffer overflow.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to play a specially crafted multimedia file, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
